Room.Name: Megan's Hut
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the hut of Megan, oldest daughter of Mehetable.
Room.LongDescription: There's nothing here but a simple straw mattress and small fireplace with a cauldron over it. Three books are stacked neatly near the pile of straw. The title of the book on top is, "Precious Metals and Horticulture, A New Approach." It lies open to page 312.
